mapper.select: SELECT rnum, notice_id, notice_title, notice_regdate, notice_hitcount FROM( SELECT rownum as rnum, notice_id, notice_title, notice_regdate, notice_hitcount FROM ( SELECT notice_id, notice_title, notice_regdate, notice_hitcount FROM notice ORDER BY notice_regdate DESC, notice_id DESC ) WHERE rownum <= #{endRowNo} ) WHERE rnum >= #{startRowNo}
SELECT notice_id, notice_title, notice_content, notice_regdate, notice_hitcount, notice_filename FROM notice WHERE notice_id = #{noticeId}
mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET notice_hitcount = notice_hitcount + 1 WHERE notice_id = #{noticeId}
mapper.select: SELECT notice_id, notice_title FROM notice WHERE #{noticeId} > notice_id ORDER BY notice_id DESC FETCH FIRST ROWS ONLY
SELECT notice_id, notice_title FROM notice WHERE notice_id > #{noticeId} ORDER BY notice_id FETCH FIRST ROWS ONLY
SELECT notice_filename, notice_filetype, notice_filedata FROM notice WHERE notice_id = #{noticeId}
